name: Code
semantic_context: Run custom JavaScript or Python code
natural_language_description: 这是 Code 节点。主要用于: Run custom JavaScript or Python code

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 默认值: runOnceForAllItems
available_options: Run Once for All Items (值: runOnceForAllItems) - Run this code only once, no matter how many input items there are
Run Once for Each Item (值: runOnceForEachItem) - Run this code as many times as there are input items

language.name: language
language.natural_language_description: 参数名: Language | 默认值: javaScript

jsCode.name: jsCode
jsCode.description: JavaScript code to execute.  Tip: You can use luxon vars like `$today` for dates and `$jmespath` for querying JSON structures. Learn more.
jsCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: JavaScript | 作用: JavaScript code to execute.  Tip: You can use luxon vars like `$today` for dates and `$jmespath` for querying JSON structures. Learn more.

notice.displayName:
Debug by using print() statements and viewing their output in the browser console.

The native Python option does not support _ syntax and helpers, except for _items in all-items mode and _item in per-item mode.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description:
参数名: Debug by using print() statements and viewing their output in the browser console.

The native Python option does not support _ syntax and helpers, except for _items in all-items mode and _item in per-item mode.

pythonCode.name: pythonCode
pythonCode.description: Python code to execute.  Tip: You can use built-in methods and variables like `_today` for dates and `_jmespath` for querying JSON structures. Learn more.
pythonCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Python | 作用: Python code to execute.  Tip: You can use built-in methods and variables like `_today` for dates and `_jmespath` for querying JSON structures. Learn more.
